video_info.title: Super Smash 2025/26 Men's
video_info.shortDescription: Auckland Aces face the Northern Brave in a Super Smash top-of-the-table showdown at Eden Park Outer Oval. With both teams battling to stay at the top, fans can expect a high-stakes thriller so will the hosts make home advantage count, or will the visitors walk away with the win? Find out who comes on top as we bring you all the action from the Super Smash 2025/26 Men's, LIVE on Sony LIV.
